element.title: Menuseparator
element.desc: A horizontal separator for pull-down menus.
element.longdescription:
Note: Redmond components are deprecated. Please consider using LZ Components. If you use this component, you must explicitly include the redmond library:
<include href="redmond"/>

Description:
The menuseparator tag provides a horizontal separator for pull-down menus. This tag must reside within a menu tag.

Example:
<canvas height="160" debug="true">
    <include href="redmond"/>
    <menubar width="200" height="25">
        <menu label="Menu" hasbutton="true"  >
            <menuitem label="item 1" />  
            <menuitem label="item 2" />  
            <menuseparator/>  
            <menuitem label="item 3" />  
        </menu>
    </menubar>
</canvas>

See also:
command, menu, menubar, menuitem

attribute.name: inset
attribute.desc: The number of pixels the separartor line is inset on both the left and right sides of a menu. The default value for the inset is 3 pixels.
